subject: Television
Ratings and Rating Systems
Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh’s 27-23 win over Arizona in the Super Bowl on NBC attracted average viewership of 95.4 million, the second most for the game after last year’s 97.5 million for the Giants’ upset over New England.
snippet: Pittsburgh’s 27-23 win over Arizona in the Super Bowl on NBC attracted average viewership of 95.4 million, the second most for the game after last year’s 97.5 million for the Giants’ upset over New England.
